## RecordJar.readRecordJarFileSync() function

Reads a record-jar file from a supplied path.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function readRecordJarFileSync(srcPath: string, options?: JarRecordParserOptions): Result<JarRecord[]>;
```
